cast.name: 坎贝尔·斯科特 Campbell Scott
伊丽莎白·阿什利 Elizabeth Ashley
奥林匹娅·杜卡基斯 Olympia Dukakis
托芙·菲尔德舒 Tovah Feldshuh
约翰·斯拉特里 John Slattery

introduction: Through verité documentary footage, humorous storytelling, interviews and archival film material, Leonard Soloway's Broadway captures a Broadway few ever see as told through the eyes of a legendary Broadway producer you've probably never heard of. He lived an unconventional life on his own terms who, over a 70-year span, staged over 100 shows (and counting) which generated history making headlines, over 40 Tony Awards, 62 Tony Nominations, 21 Drama Desk Awards, 29 Drama Desk nominations and 3 Pulitzer Prizes in addition to launching the careers of famous stars known the world over.
